pkgmetadata.longdescription: ==========zun-ui==========Zun UI* Free software: Apache license* Source: https://opendev.org/openstack/zun-ui* Bugs: https://bugs.launchpad.net/zun-uiManual Installation-------------------Install according to `Zun UI documentation <https://docs.openstack.org/zun-ui/latest/install/index.html>`_.Enabling in DevStack--------------------Add this repo as an external repository into your ``local.conf`` file:: [[local|localrc]] enable_plugin zun-ui https://github.com/openstack/zun-ui
